q0.question:
[T/F] Is following grammar regular?
G = ($\{S\}, \{a,b\}$,S,P),
P =
$S \ \rightarrow abS$
$S \ \rightarrow \ \lambda$
$S \ \rightarrow Sab$
q0.description: A regular grammar is a right-linear or left-linear grammar

q1.question: What type of the grammar is the following grammar?
q1.description: A regular grammar is a right-linear or left-linear grammar
